</button>
</form>

<span class="text-muted">or</span>

</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
<script>
let loginModal;
let pendingReportUrl = '';

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
loginModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('loginModal'));

// Add click handlers to all report links
document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="report.html"]').forEach(link => {
link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
if (!isLoggedIn()) {
e.preventDefault();
pendingReportUrl = this.getAttribute('href');
sessionStorage.setItem('pending_report', pendingReportUrl);
loginModal.show();
}
});
});

// Modal login form
document.getElementById('modal-login-form').addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
e.preventDefault();
const email = document.getElementById('modal-login-email').value;
const password = document.getElementById('modal-login-password').value;

try {
const response = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
method: 'POST',
headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
body: JSON.stringify({ email, password })
});

const data = await response.json();

if (data.success) {
localStorage.setItem('auth_token', data.token);
localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(data.user));
showModalMessage('Login successful! Redirecting...', false);

setTimeout(() => {
loginModal.hide();
const reportUrl = sessionStorage.getItem('pending_report') || pendingReportUrl;
if (reportUrl) {
window.location.href = reportUrl;
sessionStorage.removeItem('pending_report');
} else {
window.location.href = `/user/dashboard?token=${data.token}&login=success`;
}
}, 1000);
} else {
showModalMessage(data.error || 'Login failed', true);
}
} catch (error) {
showModalMessage('Network error. Please try again.', true);
}
});

// Modal signup form
document.getElementById('modal-signup-form').addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
e.preventDefault();
const username = document.getElementById('modal-signup-username').value;
const email = document.getElementById('modal-signup-email').value;
const password = document.getElementById('modal-signup-password').value;

try {
const response = await fetch('/api/auth/signup', {
method: 'POST',
headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
body: JSON.stringify({ username, email, password })
});

const data = await response.json();

if (data.success) {
localStorage.setItem('auth_token', data.token);
localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(data.user));
showModalMessage('Account created! Redirecting...', false);

setTimeout(() => {
loginModal.hide();
const reportUrl = sessionStorage.getItem('pending_report') || pendingReportUrl;
if (reportUrl) {
window.location.href = reportUrl;
sessionStorage.removeItem('pending_report');
} else {
window.location.href = `/user/dashboard?token=${data.token}&login=success`;
}
}, 1000);
} else {
showModalMessage(data.error || 'Signup failed', true);
}
} catch (error) {
showModalMessage('Network error. Please try again.', true);
}
});
});

function isLoggedIn() {
const token = localStorage.getItem('auth_token');
return token && token.length > 0;
}

function showModalMessage(text, isError) {
const messageEl = document.getElementById('modal-message');
messageEl.textContent = text;
messageEl.className = `alert mt-3 ${isError ? 'alert-danger' : 'alert-success'}`;
messageEl.style.display = 'block';
}

async function loginWithGoogle() {
try {
// Fetch Google Client ID from backend
const response = await fetch('/api/auth/google-config');
const config = await response.json();

if (!config.client_id) {
showModalMessage('Google OAuth not configured on server', true);
return;
}

// Redirect to Google OAuth
const redirectUri = window.location.origin + '/auth/google/callback';
const scope = 'email profile';
const authUrl = `https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth?client_id=${config.client_id}&redirect_uri=${encodeURIComponent(redirectUri)}&response_type=code&scope=${encodeURIComponent(scope)}&access_type=offline&prompt=consent`;

window.location.href = authUrl;
} catch (error) {
showModalMessage('Failed to initiate Google login', true);
}
}

// Handle OAuth callback token (if user ends up on homepage after OAuth)
const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
const token = urlParams.get('token');
const loginStatus = urlParams.get('login');

if (token && loginStatus === 'success') {
localStorage.setItem('auth_token', token);
// Redirect to user dashboard
window.location.href = '/user/dashboard';
}
</script>
